human_comments.typography: Generic sans-serif with poor hierarchy. All caps headers are hard to read.
human_comments.layout_composition: Template-like grid layout with no visual cohesion between sections.
human_comments.color: Basic blue/white color scheme with no sophistication.

ai_comments.typography: Clean sans-serif system with clear hierarchy through scale and weight.
ai_comments.layout_composition: Well-organized grid layout with consistent spacing and alignment.
ai_comments.color: Professional blue and white palette with good contrast.

human_comments.typography: Inconsistent font sizes and poor line spacing throughout.
human_comments.layout_composition: Haphazard placement of elements, no clear structure.
human_comments.color: Clashing colors with no coherent palette strategy.

ai_comments.typography: Diverse typography creates visual interest with good scale relationships.
ai_comments.layout_composition: Dynamic layout with creative use of asymmetry and white space.
ai_comments.color: Bold color choices create strong visual impact and brand identity.

human_comments.typography: Basic fonts with minimal hierarchy. Text feels flat and uninspired.
human_comments.layout_composition: Standard portfolio layout, nothing innovative or particularly well-executed.
human_comments.color: Safe, boring color choices that don't demonstrate color mastery.

ai_comments.typography: Solid typographic foundation with clear hierarchy and good readability.
ai_comments.layout_composition: Clean, professional layout with good use of whitespace.
ai_comments.color: Sophisticated restrained palette showing good color sense.

human_comments.typography: Mediocre font choices with poor spacing and alignment issues.
human_comments.layout_composition: Messy layout with inconsistent spacing and poor image presentation.
human_comments.color: Muddy color palette with poor contrast and no clear strategy.

ai_comments.typography: Readable typography with adequate hierarchy and spacing.
ai_comments.layout_composition: Well-structured layout with good visual flow and organization.
ai_comments.color: Thoughtful color palette with good balance and harmony.

human_comments.typography: Decent type choices but execution is sloppy with inconsistent spacing.
human_comments.layout_composition: Basic layout that works but shows no innovation or particular skill.
human_comments.color: Adequate color usage but nothing that demonstrates mastery.

ai_comments.typography: Strong typographic system with good hierarchy and readability.
ai_comments.layout_composition: Effective layout with good balance and visual interest.
ai_comments.color: Well-executed color strategy with good contrast and harmony.

common_ai_blindspots: Template detection - AI misses obvious template usage
Sloppy execution - AI sees 'clean' where humans see 'careless'
Generic design - AI rates basic/safe choices too highly
Innovation deficit - AI doesn't penalize lack of creativity enough
